channel.title: Object Oriented JS on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Object Oriented JS on JavaScript

item.title: Objectives
item.description: Understand the benefits of using Classes Create Classes with a public and private interface Create Classes that inherit properties and methods from another Class

item.title: Code Along: OOP Book Collection
item.description: Code Along: OOP Book Collection We’ll walk through the process using OOP to create a program manages a person’s book collection Get the starter code and the requirements can be found in the Github repo below: Github Repo for OOP Book Collection Use the “Assignment Submission Git Workflow” (instructions) to access the lab files and submit your completed assignment
